channel.title: Dictionaries Practice :: Introduction to Python
channel.description: Letâ€™s try some simple practice problems. These problems are not graded - they are just for you to practice before doing the real exercises in the lab itself. You can find the answers below each question by clicking the button below each question. 8.1 Reading Code Consider the following Python program: # Same function as the worked example - only accepts letters def get_input(): word = input("Enter a single word: ") while not word.
